--- layout: reference title: Class Hierarchy ---
Class Hierarchy
This inheritance list is sorted roughly, but not completely, alphabetically:
[detail level 123]
 ►Cabstract_has_many
 ►Cmatador::basic_has_many< T, std::list >
 Cmatador::has_many< T, std::list >Has many relation class using a std::list as container
 ►Cmatador::basic_has_many< T, std::vector >
 Cmatador::has_many< T, std::vector >Has many relation class using a std::vector as container
 Cmatador::basic_has_many< T, C >Base class for has many relationship classes
 Cmatador::accessGive access to the private members to a serializer
 Cmatador::anySimple any class
 Cmatador::any_visitorAn any visitor class
 ►Cbasic_column_condition
 Cmatador::condition< column, detail::basic_query >Condition class representing an IN condition
 ►Cbasic_condition
 Cmatador::condition< column, std::pair< T, T > >Between condition
 Cmatador::condition< condition< L, R >, void >Logical unary condition
 Cmatador::condition< condition< L1, R1 >, condition< L2, R2 > >Logical binary condition
 Cmatador::basic_dialectAbstract base class for a concrete sql dialect
 ►Cmatador::basic_identifier
 Cmatador::identifier< std::string >Identifier class for string
 Cmatador::identifier< T, typename std::enable_if< std::is_integral< T >::value >::type >Identifier class for integral types
 Cmatador::identifier< varchar< SIZE, T > >Identifier class for varchar
 ►Cbasic_in_condition
 Cmatador::condition< column, std::initializer_list< V > >Condition class representing an IN condition
 ►Cmatador::basic_object_store_observer
 Cmatador::typed_object_store_observer< T >Base class for typed object observer classes
 ►Cmatador::detail::basic_queryBase class for all query implementations
 Cmatador::query< T >Creates a SQL query
 Cmatador::query< row >A row based query
 ►Cmatador::basic_sql_logger
 Cmatador::null_sql_logger
 Cmatador::sql_logger
 ►Cmatador::basic_tableBase class for kind of tables
